nodes.text: Coronet Ion Works was a company that was headquartered in Coronet City, the capital of the planet Corellia, during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY, the Empire captured the company's corporate headquarters and converted it into a major communications command post. However, the Imperial forces inside were later eradicated by the Republic Military in a systematic, floor-by-floor attack devised by Colonel Rian Darok of the Republic Special Forces Division.
Coronet Ion Works was first mentioned in a Codex entry on Darok entitled "The Rogue Lord's Accomplice" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
